Articles.Content:
This is my third craft based on the Wing Commander series. This is the Dralthi which was flown by the Kilrathi empire. This ship isn't perfect since there I couldn't find circular wings. Though the Dralthi is twin-engined, I put a third engine into it for the sake of making it airworthy.

Here's the Dralthi in action

This plane is much more stable than the other Wing Commander-based ships I made. Plus it can go mach 3...

I managed to land it, though I lost both wings when it tilted over sideways...

Here's the craft file: http://www./view/2y60a2vj1bd9uks/Dralthi.craft

3 things:

1. I was thinking of doing this same thing...

2. I hummed the music from WC1 during the cinematic that shows everyone getting their helmets before getting in the fighters.

3. Now make a Rapier (because I'm no good at this.)

optional 3. Make the Tiger's Claw for all the fighters

3 things:

1. I was thinking of doing this same thing...

2. I hummed the music from WC1 during the cinematic that shows everyone getting their helmets before getting in the fighters.

3. Now make a Rapier (because I'm no good at this.)

optional 3. Make the Tiger's Claw for all the fighters

For the Rapier, I'll try to work on that... I'll have to study the diagrams of that ship...

As for the Tiger's Claw, that one might be a challenge.... plus I'm also concerned about how laggy it might be since there'd be a lot of parts involved...

As for the Tiger's Claw, that one might be a challenge.... plus I'm also concerned about how laggy it might be since there'd be a lot of parts involved...

Sounds like someone should start learning Blender and Unity...

I look forward to Wing Commanding KSP
